text: It’s the same (liturgical) day, it starts in the Christmas _Eve_ning on 24th and continues until the evening on 25.

elements.text: It’s the same (liturgical) day, it starts in the Christmas
ning on 24th and continues until the evening on 25.

text: That’s why many shops in Europe are open on 24 and close in the afternoon over the holidays

elements.text: That’s why many shops in Europe are open on 24 and close in the afternoon over the holidays
